column5: I am considering purchassing used 2000 Yamaha 9.9 HP , 4 stroke, long shaft, electric start, high trust motor. It says manufactured in 09/99 on it but apparently it is 2000 year model (?!?) What is good price for such motor at this time of the year? What would you consider "deal I should not miss" on it?  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
I can tell you that a 2006 8hp high thrust yamaha will set you back about $3400.
Thanks Taper,  waooooo....So would price of arround $1100-$1200 be considered "great buy" then?  Cheers, Ice Fisherman

I'm no expert, but it seems like that woud be the going range for a "newer" small 9.9 outboard. For example there's a 2002 Yami on E-Bay with a buy it now of $1299. If you know who you're buying it from, that's a bonus for sure.
Keeny,  I think the motor you are reffeting is 2 stroke?  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Yep.you're right. Here's an ad for new 2004 Merc 4 stroke 9.9's for $1595 new,never fired (NOS) http://www.smalloutboards.com/m99984strk.htm .
